Flub.Name: Autolevel
Flub.Description: Automatically levels the terrain where the heights are proportionately distributed between the highest and lowest points.

Flub.Name: Equalize
Flub.Description: Equalizes the terrain where the heights are linearly distributed between the highest and lowest.

Flub.Name: Log
Flub.Description: Applies logarithmic scaling that bulks up the terrain.

Flub.Name: Abs
Flub.Description: Abs node modifies the terrain by eliminating values that are either higher or lower than the value.

Flub.Name: Clamp
Flub.Description: The terrain is proportionally reduced in height.

Flub.Name: Clip
Flub.Description: The terrain is clipped beyond the extents provided.

Flub.Name: Raise
Flub.Description: Raises the terrain by the specified amount.

Flub.Name: Multiplier
Flub.Description: Multiplier is the amount by which terrain is raised.

Flub.Name: Shaper
Flub.Description: Bulks up or bulks down the output.
